name: PrepNet Tag
description: NPC trait that makes monsters see it as a Prepnet.  It is a bug if you have it.

name: YUGGOTH
mutagen_message: Strange memories of another world overwhelm youâ€¦
iv_message: You look into your own cells and change them.
//: 3-15 pain, morale boost, but no more mutagenic than cat-9s
Should be out for two minutes.  Nightmare realm becomes home
iv_sleep_message: You gaze inside, past your fear, past good and evil, into the future.
memorial_message: Prepared the way into the galaxy.

name: migo acclimatization
description: You're body is capable of living more comfortably in the mi-go atmosphere. Your scalp develops fronds that act as heat sinks.

name: Mouth Tentacles
description: A set of tentacles surrounds your mouth.  They allow you to eat twice as fast.  Slightly decreases wet penalties.

name: Mouth Flaps
description: Skin tabs and odd flaps of skin surround your mouth.  They don't affect your eating, but are unpleasant to look at.

name: Warm Natured
description: Your body becomes much more efficient at distributing heat from itself.

name: Smart
description: You are a little smarter.  Intelligence + 1

name: Very Smart
description: You are smarter.  Intelligence + 2

name: Extremely Smart
description: You are much smarter, and your skull bulges slightly.  Intelligence + 4

name: Alien Intelligence
description: You can see the connections from A to B to C to D.  You look at fellow survivors like you are imagining taking them apart.  Intelligence + 5

name: Dextrous
description: You are a little nimbler.  Dexterity + 1

name: Very Dextrous
description: You are nimbler.  Dexterity + 2

name: Extremely Dextrous
description: You are nimble and quick.  Dexterity + 4

name: Strong
description: Your muscles are a little stronger.  Strength + 1

name: Very Strong
description: Your muscles are stronger.  Strength + 2

name: Migo Ears
description: Your ears have split into a series of tuberous projections.  They waggle towards far away sounds.

name: Culler
description: You've had a revelation: by killing the weaker creatures, who would only die anyway, you preserve resources for those better able to survive.  You are less bothered by the deaths of others: their own weakness invited these fates upon them.

name: Hunter
description: Your brain has a lot more in common with a predatory animal than a human, making it easier to control misplaced reactions to the death of your prey.  Additionally, combat skills, which you use to hunt, are easier to learn and maintain.

name: YUGGOTH
description: This death throes of this world are the birthing pangs of yours.

name: fetid scent
description: Your sweat now smells otherworldly.  And not in a good way.  Thankfully now the migo ignore you.

name: Terrifying
description: There's something about you that creatures find frightening, and they are more likely to try to flee.

name: Migo Wings
description: You have a pair of large, veiny wings.  They don't appear to be made for this atmosphere but they grant a powerful buffeting attack.
